data.question: What is the highest I2 uptake reported for MFM-300 materials?
Which MFM-300 material exhibits the highest I2 storage density?
Is the adsorption of I2 in MFM-300 materials reversible?
What is the crystal system of MFM-300(Fe)·1.11I2?
What method was used to collect high resolution powder diffraction data for MFM-300(Sc)?
What is the role of hydroxyl groups in the adsorption of I2 within MFM-300?
data.answer: They mediate the binding of I2 by forming hydrogen bonds.

data.question: Does the structure of MFM-300 materials remain stable upon adsorption and desorption of I2?
What unique feature is observed at high I2 loading in MFM-300(Sc)?
data.answer: The formation of triple-helical chains of I2.

data.question: Can the adsorbed I2 molecules in MFM-300(Sc) be fully regenerated upon desorption?
What is the space group of MFM-300(In)·0.5I2?
What is the significance of the intramolecular I–I distance for adsorbed I2 molecules in MFM-300?
data.answer: It indicates the type of adsorbed I2 species and their binding environment.

data.question: Is the distribution of I2 homogeneous throughout MFM-300(Sc) upon adsorption?
What is the crystallographic resolution used to observe the formation of triple-helical chains of I2 in MFM-300(Sc)?
What is the effect of I2 adsorption on the vibrational modes of MFM-300(Sc)?
data.answer: It causes a reduction in the scattering intensity in the low energy region.

data.question: Are the I2 molecules adsorbed in MFM-300(Sc) neutral?
What is the role of the pore size and shape in the adsorption of I2 within MFM-300?
data.answer: They provide a platform to stabilize the formation of a complex assembly of molecular I2 resulting in highly efficient packing.

data.question: Does the presence of functional groups and open metal sites influence the encapsulation of I2 in MOFs?
What is the empirical formula of MFM-300(In)·0.5I2?
What is the significance of the peak at 180 cm–1 in the Raman spectra of I2-loaded MFM-300(Sc)?
data.answer: It is assigned to I–I vibration and indicates the presence of adsorbed I2 sited in the middle of the pores.

data.question: Is the adsorption capacity of I2 in MFM-300 materials consistent across multiple adsorption-desorption cycles?
